text: Shinko suru mono-tachi wa,`doshite 1-sho 〔sura〕 ga kudatte konai no ka.' To iu. Tokoroga dankotaru 1-sho ga kudasa re, sono Chu de sento no koto ga nobe rareru to, kokoro ni yamai no yadoru-sha-tachi wa, imanimo shi ni nozomu yona yowayowashi mabuta de anata o miyou. Wazawaiare (kare-ra wa shinda kata ga i)
